item.title: Were you aware of the Extender Setup process?
item.description: As someone who frequently reviews training materials, I recently came across an interesting note in the Microsoft Dynamics GP Extender manual. The manual advises users to only enable the “Auto-Update SmartLists” option in a single company within Extender’s options. This recommendation stems from the system-wide nature of SmartLists contrasting with the company-specific design of Extender windows. The suggested approach is to designate a “main” company where this option is enabled, perform all Extender configurations within that company, and then export and import the necessary windows to other companies as needed.
